mapper.select: SELECT A.BSKT_ID , A.WCRF_ID , A.MBER_ID , A.QY , A.RGSTR_ID , A.RGST_DT , A.UPDTR_ID , A.UPDT_DT , B.WCRF_NM , B.WCRF_DESC , B.WCRF_AMT , B.ATCH_FILE_ID , B.WCRF_CNT FROM TB_WCRF_BSKT A, TB_WCRF_INFO B WHERE 0 = 0 AND A.MBER_ID = #{mberId} AND A.WCRF_ID = B.WCRF_ID ORDER BY A.RGST_DT DESC
